thread.title: This Video Shows Drake’s Epic New Mansion Under Construction
thread.title_full: This Video Shows Drake’s Epic New Mansion Under Construction

author: Daniel Pearson
title: This Video Shows Drake’s Epic New Mansion Under Construction
text:
Share Tweet Email WhatsApp Comments 
As if breaking streaming records with his latest More Life project and then meeting his idol a few days later wasn’t enough, Drake is about to make his life even better with a huge new mansion in Toronto. 
The house will come complete with a a basketball court, jersey museum, luxury pool, bar area, lower level spa, awards room, snack lounge, piano room and a “security suite.” Ordinarily, we’d have to wait a long time before some magazine or TV show gained access to the house — but thanks the 6God’s go-to architect and designer, Ferris Fauli, we can already take a sneak peek at what it will look like. 
Check it out in the video below. A post shared by Ferris Rafauli "FR" (@ferrisrafauli) on Mar 18, 2017 at 3:21pm PDT
